page.title: 09Longdon Playgroup
page.content:
The Playgroup, opened in 1970 is run by a {committee of parents}and is affiliated to the {Pre-School {Playgroups Association. }The children aged between three and five are cared for by a paid supervisor and a rota Mum. A set activity follows free play, then lunch, a further play session and finally story-time. There are swings and a climbing frame available outside. Equipment must be packed away after each twice-weekly session.
The{policy}by Worcestershire schools {of admitting "rising fives"} to increase their numbers has depleted the playgroup. Joining with the Mother and Toddler group for one morning has doubled the number of children to 12 but only six attend on Fridays. The {future}of this group{is in doubt.
